file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.description: VirusAttack 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 : File ... belongs to virus/spyware
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 [^#]+ File [^#]+ belongs to virus/spyware

FastPattern.description: VirusAttack 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 : File ... belongs to adware or PUA
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 [^#]+ File [^#]+ belongs to adware or PUA

FastField.defaultValue: Adware or PUA "$10" Detected. File Left Alone

FastPattern.description: VirusAttack 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 : Virus/spyware ... has been detected in
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 [^#]+ Virus/spyware [^#]+ has been detected in

FastPattern.description: VirusAttack 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 : Virus/spyware ... has been removed
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 [^#]+ Virus/spyware [^#]+ has been removed

FastPattern.description: VirusAttack 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 : Infected file ... has been moved to
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 [^#]+ Infected file [^#]+ has been moved to

FastPattern.description: VirusAttack 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 : Adware or PUA ... has been detected
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 [^#]+ Adware or PUA [^#]+ has been detected\.

FastField.defaultValue: Adware or PUA "$9" Detected. File Left Alone

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : The on-access driver could not check device control
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2[^#]+ The on-access driver could not check device control

FastField.defaultValue: The on-access driver failed to read from file "$9"

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : The on-access driver failed to attach
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2[^#]+ The on-access driver failed to attach

FastField.defaultValue: The on-access driver failed to attach to "$9"

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : The on-access driver failed to read from file
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2[^#]+ The on-access driver failed to read from file

FastField.defaultValue: The on-access driver failed to read from file "$9"

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : The on-access driver was unable to create an impersonation token
FastPattern.matcher: (\d{4})(\d{2})(\d{2})\.(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})#([^#]+)#([^[]+)\[1\] \S+\.2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 \S+ : The on-access driver was unable to create an impersonation token for file ([^#]+)\..*
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2[^#]+ The on-access driver was unable to create an impersonation token

FastField.defaultValue: The on-access driver failed to read from file "$9"

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : Registration of protocol ... failed
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2[^#]+ Registration of protocol \S+ failed

FastPattern.description: SystemScanWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : Scanning ... returned SAV Interface error
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2[^#]+ Scanning [^#]+ returned SAV Interface error

FastField.defaultValue: Scan of "$9" returned SAV Interface error

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : Insufficient memory
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2[^#]+ Insufficient memory

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : Loading SAV Interface returned the error
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2[^#]+ Loading SAV Interface returned the error

FastPattern.description: SystemScanWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : The folder ... doesn't exist
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2[^#]+ The folder [^#]+ doesn't exist

FastPattern.description: SystemScanWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : Unknown error ... decomposing
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2[^#]+ Unknown error \S+ decomposing

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : on-access driver adapter failed to get a filename
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2[^#]+ The on-access driver adapter failed to get a filename

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : on-access scanner could not create a transaction context
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2[^#]+ The on-access scanner could not create a transaction context

FastPattern.description: FileAuditFailure 2604.2.1.1.2.1.3 : Access to location was blocked
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.3[^#]+ Access to location \\"[^"]+" was blocked

FastPattern.description: FileAuditFailure 2604.2.1.1.2.1.3 : On-access scanner has denied access to location
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.3[^#]+ On-access scanner has denied access to location

FastField.defaultValue: On-access scanner has denied access to "$9"

FastPattern.description: FileAudit 2604.2.1.1.2.1.3 : Suspicious file|process ... has been authorized
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.3[^#]+ Suspicious (file|process) \\"[^"]+" has been authorized\.

FastPattern.description: ProcessWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.3 : Process ... exhibiting suspicious behavior pattern
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.3[^#]+ Process \\"[^"]+\\" exhibiting suspicious behavior pattern

FastPattern.description: VirusAttack 2604.2.1.1.2.1.3 : File ... identified as suspicious
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.3 [^#]+ File [^#]+ has been identified as suspicious

FastPattern.description: VirusAttack 2604.2.1.1.2.1.3 : File ... has been cleaned up
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.3 [^#]+ File [^#]+ has been cleaned up

FastPattern.description: PolicyModify 2604.2.1.1.2.1.6 : Use of controlled device type ... enabled|disabled
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.6[^#]+ Use of controlled device type

FastPattern.description: FileAuditFailure 2604.2.1.1.2.1.6 : Attempt to write to controlled device
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.6[^#]+ Attempt to write to controlled device

FastField.defaultValue: Attempt to write to controlled device "$9" blocked

FastFormatter.format: Attempt to write to controlled device "(no device name)" blocked

FastPattern.description: [2] ProcessWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : Communication ... error between on-access driver and service
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 \(OctetString\) :\s*#\[2\] Communication \(OctetString\) : error between on-access driver and service

FastField.defaultValue: Communication error between on-access driver and service

FastPattern.description: [2] SystemScanInfo 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : ... condition cleared
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 \(OctetString\) :\s*#\[2\] \\"\S+ \(OctetString\) : [^"]*"? condition cleared

FastPattern.description: [2] SystemScanInfo 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : File ... scan succeeded following a timeout/busy condition
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 \(OctetString\) :\s*#\[2\] File \(OctetString\) : [^#]+ scan succeeded following a timeout/busy condition

FastField.defaultValue: File scan succeeded following a timeout/busy condition

FastPattern.description: [2] SystemScanWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : Scan Failure
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 \(OctetString\) :\s*#\[2\] Scan \(OctetString\) : failure

FastPattern.description: [2] SystemScanWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : on-access scan did not complete in time
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 \(OctetString\) :\s*#\[2\] The \(OctetString\) : [^#]+ scan of file [^#]+ did not complete in time:

FastPattern.description: [2] ServiceWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : on-access driver failed to determine the name for a file
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 \(OctetString\) :\s*#\[2\] The \(OctetString\) : on-access driver failed to determine the name for a file

FastPattern.description: [2] ServiceWarning 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 : Web Protection error
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.2 \(OctetString\) :\s* Web Protection error

FastPattern.description: [2] ServiceInfo 2604.2.1.1.2.1.4 : Sophos SNMP test message
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.4 \(OctetString\) :\s* Sophos SNMP test message

FastPattern.description: FileAuditFailure 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 File has not been cleaned up
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1.+? File .+ has not been cleaned up

FastField.defaultValue: File $9 has not been cleaned up

FastPattern.description: VirusAttack 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1 Virus was not removed
FastPattern.pattern: 2604.2.1.1.2.1.1.+? Virus/spyware '[^']+' was not removed because of errors

FastField.defaultValue: Virus/spyware "$9" was not removed because of errors

FastPattern.description: InternalNewToolData 2604.2.1.1. unmatched
NullAlert Black Hole
